items.title: Chapter I
items.author: rich@thislife.org (Serial & This American Life)
items.content:encoded: “If you keep your mouth shut, you’ll be surprised what you can learn.”
items.content:encodedSnippet: “If you keep your mouth shut, you’ll be surprised what you can learn.”

items.creator: rich@thislife.org (Serial & This American Life)
items.title: Chapter IV
items.author: rich@thislife.org (Serial & This American Life)
items.content:encoded: “If anybody could find it, it would be me.”

items.title: Chapter V
items.author: rich@thislife.org (Serial & This American Life)
items.content:encoded: “Nobody’ll ever change my mind about it.”

items.creator: rich@thislife.org (Serial & This American Life)
items.title: Chapter VI
items.author: rich@thislife.org (Serial & This American Life)
items.content:encoded: “Since everyone around here thinks I’m a queer anyway.”

items.content:encoded: “You’re beginning to figure it out now, aren’t you?”

title: S-Town
description: S-Town is a podcast hosted by Brian Reed from Serial Productions, a New York Times company. The story follows a man named John who despises his Alabama town and decides to do something about it. He asks Brian to investigate the son of a wealthy family who's allegedly been bragging that he got away with murder. But when someone else ends up dead, the search for the truth leads to a nasty feud, a hunt for hidden treasure, and an unearthing of the mysteries of one man's life.
copyright: Copyright 2017 S-Town Podcast and Brian Reed

owner.name: Serial Productions & The New York Times
